# Pull Request

## Summary
- Describe what this PR changes and why.

## Changes
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Fix
- [ ] Docs
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] CI/Build
- [ ] Chore

## Screenshots / Demos
- If UI-related, add before/after or a short demo.

## How to Test
- Steps or commands to verify the change locally.

## Checklist
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Lint and typecheck pass (`pnpm run lint`, `pnpm run typecheck`)
- [ ] Rust lints pass (`cargo fmt`, `cargo clippy -- -D warnings`)
- [ ] Docs updated (README/docs)
- [ ] Linked issues and added a clear PR title (Conventional Commits)
